prod_desc.heading: Why buy Xiaomi 11i 5G
features: Triple Camera Rear Camera with 16MP Front Camera to get best and amazing pictures and videos
MediaTek Dimensity 920 Processor for speedy performance
16.94 cm (6.67 inch) Full HD+ AMOLED Display for best quality
5160 mAh Li-Polymer Battery ensures long battery hours
Storage 128GB to store all your photographs, recordings, and individual data
sub_features: Assuming you are searching for an allrounder phone with a piece of the best highlights stacked in it then the Xiaomi 11i 5G is for you. It accompanies Mediatek Dimensity 920 Processor based on the Android 11 working framework which is perhaps the best processor in the segment. With this, you are getting an enormous 5160 mAh Li-Polymer Battery which will give you a battery reinforcement of as long as 24 hours which is cool at this segment, and with this, you are getting a 67W Turbocharge and it will charge your phone 50% in under 13 minutes which is very quick. The Xiaomi 11i 5G is the best phone in this segment. With 16.94 cm (6.67 inches) Full HD+ AMOLED Display gives you precision and the best quality.

Get the Xiaomi 11i 5G phone which is the best phone in the segment and at a reasonable cost. With 108 MP f/1.89 Aperture, 8 MP f/2.2 Aperture 120 Degree Ultra Wide Camera, 2 MP Macro Camera for better photography and videography and with 16MP Front Camera to take selfies. Capacity is the most remarkable viewpoint to get this phone with 128GB ROM you can without much stretch store every one of your information. With 8GB RAM for better performing various tasks. Checking out confirmation and security, there are several important sensors stacked in this phone those are Accelerometer, Gyro Sensor, E-compass, Proximity Sensor, Ambient Light Sensor, Side Fingerprint Sensor with the objective that you can without a doubt get your data safe in your phone. So, what are you waiting for! Get the Xiaomi 11i 5G online, right now!

features.title: Display
features.desc: 6.67 inches (16.94 cm), AMOLED, 120 Hz Refresh Rate

features.title: Camera
features.desc: 108 MP + 8 MP + 2 MP Triple Rear & 16 MP Front Camera

features.title: Security (Lock)
features.desc: Password | Pattern | PIN | Fingerprint Sensor | Face Unlock

faqs.ans: While Xiaomi is widely known for its cheap, low-cost phones, the company choose not to constantly introduce new models. The company's strategy involves keeping the same products on the market longer than most competitors, and releasing subtle changes every now and then to keep their products fresh.

faqs.que: What is the full form of MIUI?
faqs.ans: (Mobile Internet UI) A version of the Android operating system from China-based consumer electronics manufacturer Xiaomi Inc. Developed for the Chinese market in 2010, MIUI was based on code from Android Version 2.2 (Froyo) and CyanogenMod.

faqs.que: How long do Xiaomi phones last?
How long can Xiaomi battery last?
faqs.ans: The battery life does not last for 2 days, if used heavily, but can last for around 25-26 hours easily.
The smartphone packs in a 4300mAh battery and Xiaomi claims that it can fully charge in mere nine minutes.
